message: In the IRC client, LimeChat for example you can have a window that combines all the activity in all groups - its handy as a summary to see everything that is going on.
I now leave a pinned tab in Chrome for convore
but at a quick glance I can't easily see what has changed
Sure, I see the number next to groups but to see if its a group/topic I'm interested in I need to hover over with my mouse
If I leave it in a specific group I can see the updates and the recent topics - that works well but generally speaking I don't stay in one group so it doesn't actually help me that much.
